translation.en: His determination was obvious as he kept trying.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.
Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: He hadn't wanted to be taught.

translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: The switch was faulty, and did not work.
Once everyone was ready, they asked for him to begin the story.
She forbid him to continue on this path.
Regardless of their action, the wound still hurt.
The key refused to unlock the door.
The gardener offered seeds to anyone who wanted them.
It was time to let go, so she disembarked.
The condition they found themselves in was unambiguous.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: He couldn't appreciate what they were trying to say.
The child hurt from their fall.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: He held the board, while she hammered it in.
translation.tam: Darmok. Darmok at Tanagra. Darmok and Jilad at Tanagra.

translation.en: The talks for creating a climate agreement were ongoing today.
Eventually they were able to get the idea behind it.
